oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Navy Cross Citation - D. Arnold Singleton
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Singleton, D. Arnold; U.S. Navy; World War II; Pearl Harbor; awards;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A Navy Cross citation for Ensign D. Arnold Singleton for acts of bravery during the attack on Pearl Harbor.
